entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
